/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/mpp_linux_demo.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpp_linux_demo.dir/mpp/Codec.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpp_linux_demo.dir/thread/Thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpp_linux_demo.dir/rkrga/RGA.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpp_linux_demo.dir/rkdrm/bo.c.o CMakeFiles/mpp_linux_demo.dir/rkdrm/dev.c.o CMakeFiles/mpp_linux_demo.dir/rkdrm/modeset.c.o  -o mpp_linux_demo   -L/home/rpdzkj/Downloads/mpp/inc  -L/home/rpdzkj/Downloads/mpp  -L/home/rpdzkj/Downloads/mpp/osal/linux  -Wl,-rpath,/home/rpdzkj/Downloads/mpp/inc:/home/rpdzkj/Downloads/mpp:/home/rpdzkj/Downloads/mpp/osal/linux -lmpp -lpthread -ldrm
